(OOC: Thanks, I wouldn't want my characters to be doomed to sitting there
forever.)


Armada/Blizzard/Kamodia



(Armada gets up, being the first to walk out. Blizzard and Kamodia follow.
Armada see's Feline some feet away from the shuttle. Armada, Blizzard, and
Kamodia aproach Feline. The 3 kneel down.)


Kamodia: Hey, whats wrong? Are you okay?


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, March 19, 2001 11:09 AM
Subject: Re: Feline


> Logo, I think hotmail is seriously messing up on your posts. You
> should consider posting straight from eGroups.
>
> ::Shuttle::
>
> The shuttle that Kamodia, Blizzard, and Armada are in lands near
> Feline, the hatch opening.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> > ::Feline::
> >
> > She stood up, but could hardly stand and leaned against a large
> tree.  Her
> > leopard skin was starting to fall off.  Her arms and legs were bare
> metal.
> > Her tail was barren of skin as well and her face looked like she had
> on an
> > old cat mask instead of her normal skin.  She fell to her knees and
> cried.
> > As soon as she hit the ground, the rest of her skin fell off her
> metalic
> > body.  She was now all crome.  Her looked like a full figured,
> slender,
> > crome plated feline female bot.  The pain was starting to subside
> but she
> > was still in agony.  She lay on her side on the ground, in the old
> leopard
> > skin that once covered her body.  She meowed quietly, pulling the
> fur over
> > her body and curled up in her old pelt.
